EmailTemplate.name: WC-2014-11-Phantom Drone 5.0.Confirmation Email to Lead
EmailTemplate.subject: Phantom 2 Vision+ Entry and 5.0 Control Module License
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Thank You for Downloading, {{lead.First Name:default=}} Get Your License Key Here. <http://go.vmturbo.com/new-cloud-edition-license.html?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=phantom> {{Lead.First Name:default=Turbofriend}},
Thank you for downloading a free trial of VMTurbo 5.0, the world's only software-driven decision engine for cloud and virtual environments.
You have been entered into our drawing pool for a coveted Phantom 2 Vision+ RC Dronecopter. Drawings will be held November 28, 2014; December 19, 2014; and January 30, 2015 (Click for Terms & Conditions <http://vmturbo.com/5_0-phantom-terms-conditions/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=phantom>).
Once you've deployed your instance of VMTurbo 5.0 <http://vmturbo.com/resources/vmturbo-quick-start-guide/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=phantom>, click the button below to access a trial license for our newest Control Modules:
- Network Control - Hybrid Cloud Control - VDI Control - Application Control - Container Control Get Control Modules <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-control-module-download/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=phantom> Downloads White Papers Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
